title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Back: Rapid Neutralization of Rocket Launchers in Southern Lebanon”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

In a quick cycle closure, a launcher that fired to Shomera space was destroyed last night; the IDF attacked in southern Lebanon.

Last night (Tuesday), a number of launches from Lebanese territory that fell in open areas in the Shomera area were identified. In a short time, an aircraft of the Air Force attacked and destroyed the launcher from which the rockets were fired in the Tyre Harfeh area. In addition, a military building of the Hezbollah terrorist organization in which terrorists were staying was attacked in the area.

During the night, combat aircraft of the Air Force attacked terror infrastructures in the Merkava area, a military building in the Aita al-Shaab area, and an observation post in the Marwahin area belonging to Hezbollah.

In addition, IDF forces attacked with artillery fire to remove threats in the Shi’ah and Kfar Shuba areas.

Attached is documentation from the attacks: https://bit.ly/3xQozsO
